participant_1.background:
I have a pet cat who loves to nap on my bed.
I am far away from my sister and family.
I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees!
I like to spend my free time doing activities that I can profit from, like selling items online or doing odd jobs for people.
i drive a van.

participant_2.background:
I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience.
i m terrified of heights.
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
I enjoy listening to jazz while I fly my model airplanes.
I love romantic comedies, and they help me forget about my bad luck in relationships.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you.  How about you?
Doing well, thank you!  I just got back from Mardi Gras in New Orleans.
Mardi Gras sounds like a lot of fun!  Did you do anything interesting there?
I went to a parade and ate a lot of delicious food!  I also got to meet some really nice people.
That sounds great!  I'm glad you had a good time.
Thank you!  I'm looking forward to going back again next year.
Me too!  I've never been to New Orleans, but it sounds like a great place to visit.
It is!  There's a lot to see and do there.
Do you have any other hobbies besides traveling?
I love jewelry design.  I find it really relaxing to be able to create something beautiful with my hands.
That's so cool!  I've never tried jewelry design before.
You should give it a try!  It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that!  Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome!  I hope you have a great day!
